OK this show really sucks. I was hoping it would get better but doesn't look like it will. I heard about this show when James Fox on Coast 2 Coast AM. The thing is though if a UFO investigation show is too good like the the UFO Hunters it will be taken off the air. I so miss the UFO Hunters :(

i think you have to give it a chance...

but they do seem to not take it very seriously and
scream and yell and laugh alot.. its like watching a school outing with excited kids.

they need to loose ryder
